dcterms:creator: Steve Plimpton
dcterms:description: A dataset generated from a simulation of a diamond structure containing 1,000 carbon atoms subjected to tensile deformation over a total of 10 time steps sampled at intervals of 1,000. The dataset includes pairs of vectors containing upper triangular entries from bond-order potential matrices at consecutive time steps.
dcterms:title: Diamond Structure Dataset
mls:task: Predicting future states of molecular dynamics
